string.name: permission_location_desc
string.value: Used for long task pages to allow applications to obtain device location information

string.name: permission_location_background_desc
string.value: Used for long task pages to allow applications to obtain device location information while running in the background

string.name: permission_approximately_location_desc
string.value: Used for long task pages to allow applications to get fuzzy device location information

string.name: permission_keep_background_running_desc
string.value: It is used to backtrack long/short tasks, allowing Service Ability to run continuously in the background

string.name: short_time_task
string.value: Request transient tasks in the background

string.name: long_time_task
string.value: Request continuous tasks in the background

string.name: remaining_time
string.value: Time remaining before the application enters the suspended state:%d

string.name: remain_time_fail
string.value: Failed to get the remaining time, please put the app in the background, then return to this page again, and click the button again
